member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Auditing.AbpAuditingOptions.HideErrors
member.summary: If this value is true, auditing will not throw an exceptions and it will log it when an error occurred while saving AuditLog. Default: true.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Auditing.AbpAuditingOptions.ApplicationName
member.summary: The name of the application or service writing audit logs. Default: null.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Auditing.AbpAuditingOptions.AlwaysLogOnException
member.summary: Audit log on exceptions. Default: true.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Auditing.AbpAuditingOptions.IsEnabledForIntegrationServices
member.summary: Disables/enables audit logging for integration services. Default: false.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Auditing.EntityChangeInfo.EntityTenantId
member.summary: TenantId of the related entity. This is not the TenantId of the audit log entry. There can be multiple tenant data changes in a single audit log entry.

member.name: F:Volo.Abp.Auditing.EntityPropertyChangeInfo.MaxValueLength
member.summary: Maximum length of and properties. Value: 512.
